Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $12000 by us due to its unique features, high-quality materials, and the expertise that went into its creation. Considering its unparalleled benefits and capabilities, I believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection or business. To make this opportunity even more appealing, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $10000. Don't miss out on this chance to experience the difference our product can make. Let's discuss further to ensure it meets all your requirements. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
